ygData.subject: Re: Veratis sucks. (literally.)
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis laughs an evil laugh at the young protohuman. I look forward to your feeble atempt, by then it should be time for me to feed again. With those words

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Veratis laughs an evil laugh at the young protohuman. "I look forward to
your feeble atempt, by then it should be time for me to feed again." With
those words the old transformer turned and flew off toward his ship to fast
for the child to follow. The drones took a moment to scoop up some
protohuman DNA for Veratis' experiments before following him back to base.

OOC, I'm gonna take a few days off, Until I return I leave my bots at the
Black fortress in Airlys capable hands.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2001 8:30 AM
Subject: Re: Veratis sucks. (literally.)


> OOC: I'm still going for the proto human bot.
>
> BIC: A new protohuman, younger arrived on the scene.
> He pointed a spear at Veratis as he slowly approached
> his father. He pulled away the knife, and a flute
> around his belt.
>
> PH: I will return. And take the power my father
> sought. I am Tara Conna, New Life Bringer, of my
> people.
>
> --- CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote:
> > Veratis shook the frail humanoid in his hand.
> > "Pathetic creatures. It would
> > seem that this planets futures based on inferior
> > beings." A drone floated
> > near and scanned Saurus. "I guess they have a use
> > after all." Veratis said
> > as he observed the findings. "It seems that these
> > beings are plasma based
> > internally." he licked his lips hungery for the
> > taste of the real thing
> > instead of the synthetic mixture he pumped into his
> > chamber each night. "It
> > may only be a morsel but it's still plasma." The
> > half bat creature opened
> > his mouth and bit down on the protohumans neck
> > draining him of every last
> > drop. Veratis looked at the pendant that had caused
> > Nightmenace such pain.
> > "This on the other hand might prove usefull" the old
> > bot pulled the silver
> > item from around the neck of Saurus and dropped the
> > lifeless body to the
> > ground.
> >
> > (Depending which superstition you follow about the
> > werewolf, Lycanthrops can
> > be hurt or killed by other members of the undead.
> > Nobody knows what it would
> > take to kill Veratis, nobody's tried.)
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
> > Sent: Monday, November 26, 2001 8:29 AM
> > Subject: Re: Arise creatures of the night.
> >
> >
> > > Saurus looked up with anger.
> > >
> > > Saurus: DEMON! DARK LORD OF THE UNDERWORLD!
> > >
> > > He went unconcious.
> > >

> > > > Veratis swung his wings around protecting his
> > body
> > > > from the lunging
> > > > werewolf. the gash his right wing took would
> > heal

> > > > immediate. The half bat creature watched
> > carefully
> > > > as Nightmenace
> > > > disappeared from sight. His attention again
> > turned
> > > > to the protohuman. "I
> > > > believe you were saying something about an or
> > else."
> > > > his batlike claw came
> > > > down picking up Saurus, "Speak now or you'll
> > soon be
> > > > resting in peace."

> > still
> > > > got a gash in his

> > > > his neck. He let
> > > > > out a yelp of pain and ran westward at break

> > > > > on the ground fighting to stay concious.
